home.title: Jorge Chávez
home.subtitle: Full Stack Developer and Secure Software Architect
home.description: I am a Computer Engineer from UNAM, passionate about modern web development and information security. I have worked on projects that combine elegant interfaces with secure architectures, integrating technologies like React, Node.js, MongoDB, and cryptographic protocols. I am currently enrolled in an Information Security diploma program at LabSec UNAM and working on my professional thesis focused on the design and implementation of secure software.

contact_modal.title: Write your email to connect
contact_modal.contact_success: Thank you! I’ll get back to you soon.
